title: No MIR available for `DefId` when compiling `wgpu`

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code [gist](https://gist.github.com/flippette/47b228967b01e9ffc3e89a2ff5a92587) ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.71.0-nightly (2f2c438dc 2023-05-08) binary: rustc commit-hash: 2f2c438dce75d8cc532c3baa849eeddc0901802c commit-date: 2023-05-08 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.71.0-nightly LLVM version: 16.0.2 ``` ### Error output ``` error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_monomorphize/src/collector.rs:1038:9: no MIR available for DefId(28:2997 ~ wgpu_core[958f]::track::texture::{impl#0}::any_exclusive) error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_monomorphize/src/collector.rs:1038:9: no MIR available for DefId(28:2781 ~ wgpu_core[958f]::track::buffer::{impl#0}::any_exclusive) error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_monomorphize/src/collector.rs:1038:9: no MIR available for DefId(28:2780 ~ wgpu_core[958f]::track::buffer::{impl#0}::all_ordered) error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_monomorphize/src/collector.rs:1038:9: no MIR available for DefId(28:2996 ~ wgpu_core[958f]::track::texture::{impl#0}::all_ordered) error: could not compile `wgpu` (lib) ```
Backtrace

``` Compiling wgpu v0.16.0 error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_monomorphize/src/collector.rs:1038:9: no MIR available for DefId(28:2997 ~ wgpu_core[958f]::track::texture::{impl#0}::any_exclusive) thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', /rustc/2f2c438dce75d8cc532c3baa849eeddc0901802c/compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1650:9 stack backtrace: 0: std::panicking::begin_panic:: 1: ::bug:: 2: ::bug:: 3: rustc_middle::util::bug::opt_span_bug_fmt::::{closure#0} 4: rustc_middle::ty::context::tls::with_opt::::{closure#0}, !>::{closure#0} 5:
